I was hoping someone would like to debate whether they support Bush going into Iraq. I would be pro-Bush. I also would like to request a judge for this debate. It would be 5 posts 4 posts. Also the person who decides to go first will have the last closing argument.
I can do that with ya :) bring it on!
Might I point out that the invasion and occupation are seperate issues (or at least they are to me!).

So does someone want to take up the challenge? I would also like to clarify on whether it is "invade" or "occupy" or else both. Someone else has already said they will take up the debate, but there has been no activity since. If there is already a debate planned I appologize, but I would like to participate in a formal debate and this seems to me one that I could handle without being totally humiliated :). I will point out that I have never participated in any formal debate but would like to start. If someone else is already going to debate the original poster on this then I'll just crawl off to some other debate to start on, but if there has been no challenge, I would be willing to take the original poster up on the challenge.
I would like to judge, or debate someone that is against the invasion and occupation(if the original has left). But if i judge i will do so fairly.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  War In Iraq
